channel.title: Were is kaits?
channel.description:
Has he quit Online Community? Is he on moparisthebest? Dose he know about moparisthebest? What Communitys do he visit?
Sorry just some egar questions.

item.title: Were is kaits?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Skating On Java:

Company’s as “high up” as JaGeX can shut down websites that disrupt there sales…Aryan was disrupting JaGeX’s Members making them loose money and Members…

Not really. It made yews, lobbies, etc so much cheaper.

And Kaitnieks was the best…how did you guys know to come to mopars when he gave up? I just checked back every couple days until I was sure no one was going to take over. Then I quit cheating and rs for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Were is kaits?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Well I got pretty tired of the old page and I thought I would spend a little time putting together a decent looking page. This page functions the same way as the old one did, you can simply download SCAR. It also allows me to post up some news about SCAR every now and then. Rumor has it that the next version is in development by a third party. My other plans for the SCAR site is to add a more resource friendly wiki and actually put some work into that. Can't say I have any promises for a script dump. But the wiki would at least allow others to contribute as they saw fit. Who knows what will come in the next news update.

Read full topic

Dejavu = Exactly what jagex did with moparscape.
That was not spam!, They threatend to take leagal action.

Learn the definition of Dejavu. It was spam.

Posts should only contain informative information. You could have atleast explained why in your post.

fff.
[/quote]
I JUST DID EXPLAIN MY POST!
[/quote]
With another post posted after i posted the reason.
I meant you should have explained it within the first post. Not waited for people to play guessing games.

Have you read the rules?
[/quote]
Yes. Im assuming the smart percent of this community knows what dejavu means![/quote]
Yes, and you’re not in that percent.

Shall i describe it to you a little more simpler?
We (us, the community, the people here, readers of the thread) don’t know wtf (what the fuck, just incase you didn’t know) what you were “Dejuvu-ing” about.

Get it, now?
Or do i have to replace your brain with a fishes and explain it again? I’m sure that would work better.

item.title: Were is kaits?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

$respect$:

Oh i thought jagex forced him 2 shut it down or theyd take legal action

They threatened legal action, and all the mods went through the site deleting anything that was copyrighted by Rs, such as pictures.

Then Kait shut the forums down and put it up for sale for a bit, but from the money the site made from ads, the cost wasn’t cheap.

And his baby… It was all too much for him. So yeh… Now we’re here.
Jagex can’t scare good ol’ Mopar. He’s got guns. (lawl).

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:15, topic:50535”][quote author=$respect$ link=topic=70926.msg806358#msg806358 date=1169482766]
Oh i thought jagex forced him 2 shut it down or theyd take legal action
[/quote]
dumbdydumb.
Dejavu.[/quote]
Stop spamming. You’ll be either Muted or Warned, soon.
